text: David Blocker (born May 4, 1955) is an American film producer. He is the son of actor Dan Blocker, and the older brother of actor Dirk Blocker. In 1998, he won an Emmy for producing Don King: Only in America. ==Filmography== All films, he was producer unless otherwise noted. ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Year !
